Title: Dark Dungeons 2.9
Credits: Created by Dominic Umbrasas (dumbrasa@ucsc.edu), (original code by Adam Smith amsmith@ucsc.edu).

Living Room.Body: This is a large living room with an imposingly high ceiling with wooden arches.

Chamber.Body: This is a great chamber with a heavy, extravagant desk of engraved wood. A hefty, antique skeleton key lies atop it.

Chamber Key Taken.Body: You take the hefty skeleton key. It feels cold and ancient in your hand.

Note.Body: The note reads, in cursive: You are hereby notified to leave the premises in a week after the delivery of this notice to you.

Dungeon.Body: This is a dungeon with torches intermittently placed at an equal distance apart. A heavy set of engraved doors blocks the southern passage.

Scenic Field.Body: You unlock the heavy doors with the antique key. Ascending the steps of undulating stone following the daylight, you see a scenic field of knee-length dry grass.

Trail.Body: This is an earthen trail, it has wheel tracks on it.
